LanguageData.BondedAnimalDied.stages.bonded_animal_di: Such a tender, unique animal. This universe is evil!
LanguageData.KnowColonistDied.stages.colonist_died.de: One of our people died. We should be able to take care of our people.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.colonist_eut: Yhdyskuntalainen tapettiin kylmäverisesti. Tämä yhdyskunta vaikuttaa päivä päivältä pahantahtoisemmalta.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.colonist_exe: yhdyskuntalaisen elin kerättiin ja hänet tapettiin
Yhdyskuntalainen kuoli koska yhdyskunta otti häneltä ruumiinosia. Se on kamalaa.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.colonist_org: A colonist died because someone took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.someone_was_eut: Vanki tai vieras tapettiin kylmäverisesti. Tämä yhdyskunta vaikuttaa päivä päivältä pahantahtoisemmalta.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.someone_was_exe: Vanki tai vieras kuoli koska yhdyskunta otti häneltä ruumiinosia. Se on kamalaa.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.someone_organha: A prisoner or guest died because the colony took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerDiedInnocent.stages.innocent: One of our prisoners died despite being harmless. We should be able to take care of our prisoners. If we wanted them dead, we could have at least conducted an orderly execution rather than permit that barbarism.
LanguageData.MyAuntDied.stages.my_aunt_died.label: my aunt died
LanguageData.MyBrotherDied.stages.my_brother_died.des: My brother died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyCousinDied.stages.my_cousin_died.label: my cousin died
LanguageData.MyCousinDied.stages.my_cousin_died.descr: My cousin died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyDaughterDied.stages.my_daughter_died.d: My daughter is dead. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyFatherDied.stages.my_father_died.label: my father died
LanguageData.MyFatherDied.stages.my_father_died.descr: My father died. He's gone forever.
LanguageData.MyFianceDied.stages.my_fiance_died.label: my fiance died
LanguageData.MyFianceDied.stages.my_fiance_died.descr: My fiance died. Such a man... my future is gone.
LanguageData.MyFianceeDied.stages.my_fiance_died.desc: My fiancée died. Such a woman... my future is gone.
LanguageData.MyGrandchildDied.stages.my_grandchild_di: My grandchild died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyHalfSiblingDied.stages.my_halfsibling_: My half-sibling died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyHusbandDied.stages.my_husband_died.des: My husband is dead. I am alone.
LanguageData.MyKinDied.stages.my_kin_died.label: my kin died
LanguageData.MyLoverDied.stages.my_lover_died.label: my lover died
LanguageData.MyLoverDied.stages.my_lover_died.descrip: My lover died. I am so alone.
LanguageData.MyMotherDied.stages.my_mother_died.label: my mother died
LanguageData.MyMotherDied.stages.my_mother_died.descr: My mother died. She's gone forever.
LanguageData.MyNephewDied.stages.my_nephew_died.label: my nephew died
LanguageData.MyNephewDied.stages.my_nephew_died.descr: My nephew died. Such a wonderful child.
LanguageData.MyNieceDied.stages.my_niece_died.label: my niece died
LanguageData.MyNieceDied.stages.my_niece_died.descrip: My niece died. Such a wonderful child.
LanguageData.MySisterDied.stages.my_sister_died.label: my sister died
LanguageData.MySisterDied.stages.my_sister_died.descr: My sister died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MySonDied.stages.my_son_died.label: my son died
LanguageData.MySonDied.stages.my_son_died.description: My son is dead. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyUncleDied.stages.my_uncle_died.label: my uncle died
LanguageData.MyWifeDied.stages.my_wife_died.label: my wife died
LanguageData.MyWifeDied.stages.my_wife_died.descripti: My wife is dead. I am alone.
LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionDied.stages.my_rival_d: Serves them right. Things are looking up.
LanguageData.PawnWithGoodOpinionDied.stages.my_friend: Such a wonderful person. The universe gets darker every day.
